amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to increase the government-wide goals for small business participation in federal contracts and for certain small business concerns.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases the government-wide goals for small business participation in federal contracts and for certain small business concerns.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mfume amendment (A016) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 202 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A016) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Mfume.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Mfume amendment (A016) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 202 (Roll no. 277).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mfume amendment (A016) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 202 (Roll no. 277).
